title: About AqarDot.com
tagline: We’re redefining how Egyptians find their next home.
intro: AqarDot.com is a modern real-estate platform built for Egypt. We make it simple to discover, list, and compare properties with trustworthy details and a smooth experience.
missionBody: Give everyone in Egypt a fast, fair, and transparent way to rent, buy, or sell property — from cozy studios to family villas — all in one place.

values.name: Trust
values.desc: Verified listings, clear information, and honest communication.

values.name: Simplicity
values.desc: Fast search, clean design, and fewer clicks to your dream home.

values.name: Access
values.desc: Serving all governorates — not just the big cities.

howItWorks: Search by governorate, city, and neighborhood with smart filters.
Compare photos, prices, sizes, and key amenities at a glance.
Message owners and agents safely through our platform.
ctaBody: We’re launching new features with your feedback. Tell us what you want to see next!
